restarter.partial_hang_warn: Due to a partial hang, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_hang_warn_discord: Due to a partial hang, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: This server is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minute. Please disconnect now. |||| This server is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minutes.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minute. |||| **%{servername}** is scheduled to restart in %{smart_count} minutes.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.instruction: Hold [SPACE] for 10 seconds to dismiss this message.

spawn_wep.dialog_desc: Spawn a weapon using its model name.

spawn_veh.dialog_desc: Provide coordinates in an x, y, z format to go through the wormhole
spawn_veh.dialog_error: `The vehicle model name '%{modelName}' does not exist!
